attributes.action: Call for a policy review of the British Tax system to create a level playing field for all Businesses trading in the UK.
attributes.additional_details:
The government should simplify our Corporation Tax system, with the intention of removing tax loopholes used by large companies to avoid or reduce the tax paid in the UK.
Every Company that trades in the UK, should have to pay a rate that reflects the taxes paid by its most important asset "Its Customers".
This can only be achieved by firstly demanding a Policy Review by our current Government.
